aws_securityhub_member.description: Provides a Security Hub member resource.

account_id.description: The ID of the member AWS account.

email.description: The email of the member AWS account.

invite.description: Boolean whether to invite the account to Security Hub as a member. Defaults to `false`.

id.description: The ID of the member AWS account (matches `account_id`).

master_id.description: The ID of the master Security Hub AWS account.

member_status.description: The status of the relationship between the member account and its master account.
